lead_paragraph: There is a debate over the effectiveness of driver education courses. Do they save lives, as most everyone thinks, or weaken safeguards that have been in place for years?
snippet: There is a debate over the effectiveness of driver education courses. Do they save lives, as most everyone thinks, or weaken safeguards that have been in place for years?...
abstract: Driver education requirements vary widely across the United States, with some states mandating that teens complete a comprehensive course before they can receive their license and other states not requiring completion of any course; a debate has arisen over the effectiveness of some driver education programs.

headline.main: The Mixed Bag of Driver Education
headline.seo: The Mixed Bag of Driver Education
headline.print_headline: The Mixed Bag of Driver Education
